name: Cellulose acetate
and optionally modified with propionate to form cellulose acetate propanoate
FoodContactSubstance: Cellulose acetate (CAS Reg. No. 9004-35-7), and optionally modified with propionate to form cellulose acetate propanoate (CAS Reg. No. 9004-39-1) resulting in up to 49 weight-percent propionate esters.
